document_data.name: Imryth Tower
document_data.mainbody: '''Imryth Tower''' was the home and place of business of the [[cleric]] [[Audara Imryth]] in the city of [[Westgate]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Location: The tower was located at the end of [[Twoturrets Lane]] in the southwest section of the city.
document_data.Activities: Audara sold [[potion]]s from her tower, but this was just a front to keep her role as a [[Harper]] agent a secret.
